name: Nightmare Moon
description:
Collect all the coins and escape the nightmare!

If you get hit, pickup a moon before it's too late!

Move: Left & Right arrow keys

Jump: Space bar

Restart: R

Credits:

Design: Nick Sargent, Liam Ralston

Programming: Edward Ingle, Liam Ralston

Art design: Liam Ralston, Nick Sargent

Music: Yuri Gore
